mapper.insert: insert into floor_info (id, floor, building_id, building_name, building_detail, grid_id, grid_name) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{floor,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{buildingId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{buildingName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buildingDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gridId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gridName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update floor_info set floor = #{floor,jdbcType=INTEGER}, building_id = #{buildingId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, building_name = #{buildingName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, building_detail = #{buildingDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, grid_id = #{gridId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, grid_name = #{gridName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, floor, building_id, building_name, building_detail, grid_id, grid_name from floor_info
